title.rendered: See, learn and find the Buddha

content.rendered:
See, learn and find the Buddha

A campaign that traces the footsteps of the Buddha for Incredible India.

Follow the footsteps of the Buddha in India, the crucible of Buddhism. Pay homage to the blessed one at some of the important places associated with his life. See life in a new light and take one step closer to finding the incredible you.
